content:
Edit the Critique of the Loan Structure to include this hypothetical case study in honduras:

Sources and Uses of Funds 
Uses 
 Construction $200,000 
 Capitalized Interest $12,000 
 Debt Service Reserve Fund $129,339 
 Financing Cost $5,120 
 Total $346,459 
Sources 
 Loan $346,459 
 Grant $0
 Total $346,459 
 
Monthly Household Bill 
 Monthly O&M $1,041.67 
 Monthly Debt Service $5,774.31 
 Number of households paying 237.5
 Monthly bill $28.70 

 For every $10,000 grant, it takes down the monthly bill .70 cents
